reviews.review_msg: Hard Test, Unclear lectures but a Nice Person

Gary was the best professor I ever had in university. YES, his course is very, very difficult. But if you put the time in, you can do well. As he once said, "You do you best, and I will do mine." I've never met a prof that cared more about the success and learning of his students.

Gary is one of the best professor I have ever had. The class material is complicated, but he does a great job in teaching and explaining in practical ways. Ask any unclear question because he expects clear understanding. Hard work is necessary, yet it pays off. Overall interesting class Good luck to anyone who will take the class.
Best Instructor in for ACMA in SFU, he is very knowledgeable. Exam are very though, you need to study hard and know everything, but you learn  a lot from this course.
Best professor I ever had. Loves to teach, very difficult class but if you put the time in you can do fine. He put it best as "You try your best and I'll try mine."
Hardcore class!  Took literally days worth of practicing and studying to simply pass midterms, but it really pays off.  Gary Parker is too funny :p

This is thee prof you want if you think your GPA is too high and wanna lower it (my GPA is 3.5+ and got an F >:( ). Few examples given in class. Tons of proofs (not practical). MT and Final harder than those questions on SOA. and last assignment DUE AFTER FINAL EXAM (that's something new...)
 
 Yup, great prof....
tough exams and assignments even worse than SOA level,but very helpful lecture teaching. Really a good prof!
